Package finalescape.mapcomponent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoomerangProjectile
    A ProjectileComponent for the Boomerang.
    Character
    A MapComponent for components that move.
    Coder
    The main Character of the Map, the Coder is controlled by the player.
    David
    The only Teacher that isn't out to kill the Coder.
    Desk
    The Coder's final destination in his quest.
    Failure
    A Teacher that chases down the main Character from any side of the Map.
    FrisbeeProjectile
    A genetic ProjectileComponent, corresponding to the Frisbee Item.
    Inventory
    An ArrayList of Items that a Character has.
    ItemComponent
    A MapComponent that displays Items.
    Kavita
    A Teacher that instead of destroying the main Character by walking into him, it shoots homework Packets at him.
    MapComponent
    The main class for items going in the Map.
    PacketProjectile
    A ProjectileComponent corresponding to a homework packet (the Packet Item).
    ProjectileComponent
    A MapComponent for projectiles, with some basic functionality.
    Teacher
    A Character that has a specific Item of choice, typically not attacking nor chasing the Coder if they have said Item selected.
    Wall
    A very basic MapComponent that just stays put.
